sentences.en: As an overseer, he suddenly found himself a person of consequence.
sentences.cn: 作为工头，他突然觉得自己是个重要人物。

sentences.en: He may be a man of consequence in his own village, but he is nobody here.
sentences.cn: 他在自己村里也许算个要人, 但在这里却不足道.

sentences.en: Her lawyer said she understood the consequences of her actions and was prepared to go to jail.
sentences.cn: 她的律师说她明白自己行为的后果并准备去坐牢。

sentences.en: I don’t suppose it is of any consequence now.
sentences.cn: 现在我觉得这事一点都无所谓了。

sentences.en: I regret to inform you he died as a consequence of his injuries.
sentences.cn: 我很遗憾地通知你，他因伤势太重不治身亡。

sentences.en: If you play the fool, and lose a good job on consequence , you can hardly expect much sympathy.
sentences.cn: 如果你干蠢事而失去一份好工作, 你几乎得不到大家的同情.

sentences.en: In consequence he lost his place.
sentences.cn: 结果,他失去了他的位置.

sentences.en: In consequence of your bad work I am forced to dismiss you.
sentences.cn: 由于你的工作很糟,我不得不把你解雇.

sentences.en: In this changing business environment, different demands are being placed on employees. As a consequence, the education system needs to change.
sentences.cn: 在当今变幻莫测的商业环境下，员工被提出各种不同的要求。因此，教育体系有必要随之改变。

sentences.en: It was an inevitable consequence of the decision.
sentences.cn: 那是这个决定的必然后果。

sentences.en: Many believe that poverty is a direct consequence of overpopulation.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为贫困是人口过多的直接后果。

sentences.en: Maternity services were to be reduced in consequence of falling birth rates.
sentences.cn: 由于出生率下降，产科服务会随之削减。

sentences.en: Peter blurted out the news before he considered the consequence.
sentences.cn: 彼得未考虑后果就把消息泄露了.

sentences.en: The consequence was that he caught a bad cold.
This matter is of great consequence to all of us.
sentences.cn: 对于我们来说这件事非常重要.

sentences.en: Wastage was no doubt a necessary consequence of war.
sentences.cn: 巨大的损耗无疑是战争的必然结果。

sentences.en: Where he is from is of no consequence to me.
sentences.cn: 他来自何方对我来说并不重要。

words.tran_cn: 随之发生的；作为结果的
间接的；结果的；重要的；随之发生的；自傲的

trans.tran_en: something that happens as a result of a particular action or set of conditions
